html: Plum Island is an enviro, research, cultural & historic landmark. @RepJoeCourtney & I introed Plum Island Preservation Act to: Repeal law mandating its sale Require future use be for conservation, education & research Begin process to make its lighthouse a national landmark
text:
Plum Island is an enviro, research, cultural & historic landmark. @RepJoeCourtney & I introed Plum Island Preservation Act to:
Repeal law mandating its sale
Require future use be for conservation, education & research
Begin process to make its lighthouse a national landmark
